cam_setup.shot_size_description: This animated video is presented from a first-person POV and begins with the character's right hand picking up a metallic circular object from a drawer. The focus then shifts to reveal photos, letters, and other items inside the drawer.
cam_setup.camera_focus_description: The video uses a shallow focus that starts with the background in focus. As the hand picks up the object, the focus shifts to the foreground, then transitions again to reveal the items in the background inside the drawer.

cam_motion.complex_motion_description: From a bird’s-eye angle, overhead POV perspective, the camera first moves slightly forward and to the right, then shifts slightly downward. The camera movement is relatively smooth.

In this 3D animation, the background is heavily blurred and the ground plane is unclear, making it difficult to determine the camera’s movement. However, it appears that the camera moves forward while tilting downward with minimal shaking.
From a first-person POV, the camera moves continuously forward along the street with slight unsteadiness and subtle left–right shifts, ending with a slight pan to the right.

cam_setup.camera_focus_description: The video appears to be synthetic; however, the camera appears to be using a deep focus looking at the title of the building.

cam_motion.complex_motion_description: Due to the lack of background detail, it is impossible to determine whether the camera is zooming in or moving forward.

cam_setup.shot_size_description: The video shows a person lying face down on a table full of food, with only their head and part of their arms visible, occupying 30% of the frame's height in the center. To the right, there is another partially visible person. As the camera moves backward, the blurry back of two other people becomes visible in the foreground, with only parts of their heads and shoulders visible. The shot consistently focuses on the person lying face down on the table.

cam_motion.complex_motion_description: The camera continuously zooms in on a group of people moving forward, with a slight pan to the right midway through.
The camera continuously moves backward and upward while tilting downward, with slight leftward movement and occasional rightward panning during the motion.

cam_setup.shot_size_description: The video begins with a full shot of an airplane in the sky. The camera then quickly moves backward and tilts down to reveal three planes on the runway. Two planes in the middle ground are fully visible, while one plane in the foreground is partially visible. The initial airplane in the sky occupies only a small portion of the frame.
cam_setup.subject_height_description: Initially, the camera is below the subject. As it reveals more subjects, the camera height is between the plane in the sky and the planes on the runway.

cam_motion.complex_motion_description: The camera is positioned in front of and below the plane. It initially moves backward at a steady speed to lead-track it, then speeds up while moving backward and downward, with minimal up-and-down tilt shaking throughout.
The camera follows the game character as they jump upward along the pipes, with brief pauses and minor downward shifts along the way.

cam_setup.camera_focus_description: The video shows a shower curtain in a bathroom. Initially, most of the frame is obscured by a blurred wall, with only a small portion of the background on the left side in focus. As the camera moves left, the shower curtain and more of the scene come into view, transitioning to deep focus.

cam_setup.shot_size_description: The video begins with a wide shot of a room filled with multiple figures. All the figures are brown, except for one blue and one red figure. The blue figure seems to be the main subject as it appears in the center of the frame. As the video progresses, the camera moves above the group, and the blue figure drops his trunk before standing at the head of the table.

cam_motion.complex_motion_description: From a high-angle, overhead-level perspective, the camera tilts downward while rolling slightly clockwise and performing a clockwise arc.

cam_setup.subject_height_description: The camera is positioned above the ground, looking down at a crowd below. A red human figure is centered in the frame. cam_setup.shot_size_description: The video shows a hand from a person standing on a staircase inside a house. The hand lifts slightly, and a hat from the ground floor rises into the air and lands neatly in the hand. The hat is then moved out of the frame. A second hand briefly enters the frame to display the newspaper, after which both the hand and the newspaper exit the frame.
